pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āḷavakā bhikkhū saññācikāyo kuṭiyo kārāpenti assāmikāyo attuddesikāyo appamāṇikāyo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.1.5: “purisaṃ detha, purisatthakaraṃ detha, goṇaṃ detha, sakaṭaṃ detha, vāsiṃ detha, parasuṃ detha, kuṭhāriṃ detha, kudālaṃ detha, nikhādanaṃ detha, valliṃ detha, veḷuṃ detha, muñjaṃ detha, pabbajaṃ detha, tiṇaṃ detha, mattikaṃ dethā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.1.6: Manussā upaddutā yācanāya upaddutā viññattiyā bhikkhū disvā ubbijjantipi uttasantipi palāyantipi aññenapi gacchanti aññenapi mukhaṃ karonti dvārampi thakenti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.1.8: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo rājagahe vassaṃvuṭṭho yena āḷavī tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.1.10: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā mahākassapo āḷaviyaṃ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.1.11: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya āḷaviṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.1.12: Manussā āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ passitvā ubbijjantipi uttasantipi palāyantipi aññenapi gacchanti aññenapi mukhaṃ karonti dvārampi thakenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.1.13: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āḷaviyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.1.14: “pubbāyaṃ, āvuso, āḷavī subhikkhā ahosi sulabhapiṇḍā sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.1.15: etarahi panāyaṃ āḷavī dubbhikkhā dullabhapiṇḍā, na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.1.16: Ko nu kho, āvuso, hetu ko paccayo, yenāyaṃ āḷavī dubbhikkhā dullabhapiṇḍā, na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetun”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.1.17: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākassapassa etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena āḷavī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.2.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena āḷavī tadavasari.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.2.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.2.4: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.2.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.2.6: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā āḷavake bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.2.7: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, saññācikāyo kuṭiyo kārāpetha assāmikāyo attuddesikāyo appamāṇikāyo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.2.10: ‘purisaṃ detha purisatthakaraṃ detha …pe… tiṇaṃ detha mattikaṃ dethā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.2.11: Manussā upaddutā yācanāya upaddutā viññattiyā bhikkhū disvā ubbijjantipi uttasantipi palāyantipi aññenapi gacchanti aññenapi mukhaṃ karonti dvārampi thakenti, gāvimpi disvā palāyanti bhikkhūti maññamānā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.2.14: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, saṃyācikāyo kuṭiyo kārāpessatha assāmikāyo attuddesikāyo appamāṇikāyo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.2.17: “purisaṃ detha purisatthakaraṃ detha …pe… tiṇaṃ detha mattikaṃ dethā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.2.19: vigarahitvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.1: “Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, dve bhātaro isayo gaṅgaṃ nadiṃ upanissāya vihariṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, maṇikaṇṭho nāgarājā gaṅgaṃ nadiṃ uttaritvā yena kaniṭṭho isi tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā kaniṭṭhaṃ isiṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā uparimuddhani mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ karitvā aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, kaniṭṭho isi tassa nāgassa bhayā kiso ahosi lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.4: Addasa kho, bhikkhave, jeṭṭho isi kaniṭṭhaṃ isiṃ kisaṃ lūkhaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātaṃ dhamanisanthatagattaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.6: ‘kissa tvaṃ, bho, kiso lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto’ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.7: ‘Idha, bho, maṇikaṇṭho nāgarājā gaṅgaṃ nadiṃ uttaritvā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā uparimuddhani mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ karitvā aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.8: Tassāhaṃ, bho, nāgassa bhayā kiso lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.9: ‘Icchasi pana tvaṃ, bho, tassa nāgassa anāgamanan’ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.11: ‘Api pana tvaṃ, bho, tassa nāgassa kiñci passasī’ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.13: ‘Tena hi tvaṃ, bho, taṃ nāgaṃ maṇiṃ yāca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.16: Atha kho, bhikkhave, maṇikaṇṭho nāgarājā gaṅgaṃ nadiṃ uttaritvā yena kaniṭṭho isi tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.17: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho, bhikkhave, maṇikaṇṭhaṃ nāgarājānaṃ kaniṭṭho isi etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.21: ‘bhikkhu maṇiṃ yācati, bhikkhussa maṇinā attho’ti khippaññeva agamāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.22: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, maṇikaṇṭho nāgarājā gaṅgaṃ nadiṃ uttaritvā yena kaniṭṭho isi tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.23: Addasa kho, bhikkhave, kaniṭṭho isi maṇikaṇṭhaṃ nāgarājānaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.28: ‘bhikkhu maṇiṃ yācati, bhikkhussa maṇinā attho’ti tatova paṭinivatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.29: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, maṇikaṇṭho nāgarājā gaṅgaṃ nadiṃ uttarati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.30: Addasa kho, bhikkhave, kaniṭṭho isi maṇikaṇṭhaṃ nāgarājānaṃ gaṅgaṃ nadiṃ uttarantaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.34: Atha kho, bhikkhave, maṇikaṇṭho nāgarājā kaniṭṭhaṃ isiṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.44: ‘bhikkhu maṇiṃ yācati, bhikkhussa maṇinā attho’ti pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.45: Tathā pakkantova ahosi, na puna paccāgañchi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.46: Atha kho, bhikkhave, kaniṭṭho isi tassa nāgassa dassanīyassa adassanena bhiyyoso mattāya kiso ahosi lūkho dubbaṇṇo, uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.47: Addasa kho, bhikkhave, jeṭṭho isi kaniṭṭhaṃ isiṃ bhiyyoso mattāya kisaṃ lūkhaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātaṃ dhamanisanthatagattaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.49: ‘kissa tvaṃ, bho, bhiyyoso mattāya kiso lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto’ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.50: ‘Tassāhaṃ, bho, nāgassa dassanīyassa adassanena bhiyyoso mattāya kiso lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.51: Atha kho, bhikkhave, jeṭṭho isi kaniṭṭhaṃ isiṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.3.56: Tesañhi nāma, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatānaṃ pāṇānaṃ amanāpā bhavissati yācanā amanāpā viññatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.1: Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, aññataro bhikkhu himavantapasse viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.2: Tassa kho, bhikkhave, vanasaṇḍassa avidūre mahantaṃ ninnaṃ pallalaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, mahāsakuṇasaṅgho tasmiṃ pallale divasaṃ gocaraṃ caritvā sāyaṃ taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ vāsāya upagacchati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.4: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so bhikkhu tassa sakuṇasaṅghassa saddena ubbāḷho yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.12: Tassa kho pana, bhante, vanasaṇḍassa avidūre mahantaṃ ninnaṃ pallalaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.13: Atha kho, bhante, mahāsakuṇasaṅgho tasmiṃ pallale divasaṃ gocaraṃ caritvā sāyaṃ taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ vāsāya upagacchati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.16: ‘Icchasi pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, tassa sakuṇasaṅghassa anāgamanan’ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.18: ‘Tena hi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, tattha gantvā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ ajjhogāhetvā rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ tikkhattuṃ saddamanussāvehi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.20: yāvatikā imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vāsaṃ upagatā, pattena me attho.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.25: yāvatikā imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vāsaṃ upagatā, pattena me attho.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.27: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so bhikkhu tattha gantvā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ ajjhogāhetvā rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ tikkhattuṃ saddamanussāvesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.29: yāvatikā imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vāsaṃ upagatā, pattena me attho.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.34: yāvatikā imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vāsaṃ upagatā, pattena me attho.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.39: Tathā pakkantova ahosi na puna paccāgañchi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.4.40: Tesañhi nāma, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatānaṃ pāṇānaṃ amanāpā bhavissati yācanā amanāpā viññatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.5.1: Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, raṭṭhapālassa kulaputtassa pitā raṭṭhapālaṃ kulaputtaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.5.10: So hi nāma, bhikkhave, raṭṭhapālo kulaputto sakaṃ pitaraṃ evaṃ vakkhati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.6.1: Gihīnaṃ, bhikkhave, dussaṃharāni bhogāni sambhatānipi durakkhiyāni.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.6.2: Tattha nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, evaṃ dussaṃharesu bhogesu sambhatesupi durakkhiyesu yācanabahulā viññattibahulā viharissatha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.6.3: ‘purisaṃ detha, purisatthakaraṃ detha, goṇaṃ detha, sakaṭaṃ detha, vāsiṃ detha, parasuṃ detha, kuṭhāriṃ detha, kudālaṃ detha, nikhādanaṃ detha, valliṃ detha, veḷuṃ detha, muñjaṃ detha, pabbajaṃ detha, tiṇaṃ detha, mattikaṃ dethā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.6.5: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.6.6: “Saññācikāya pana bhikkhunā kuṭiṃ kārayamānena assāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ pamāṇikā kāretabbā. Tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ—dīghaso dvādasa vidatthiyo, sugatavidatthiyā; tiriyaṃ sattantarā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.6.7: Bhikkhū abhinetabbā vatthudesanāya. Tehi bhikkhūhi vatthu desetabbaṃ— anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:1.6.8: Sārambhe ce bhikkhu vatthusmiṃ aparikkamane saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kāreyya, bhikkhū vā anabhineyya vatthudesanāya, pamāṇaṃ vā atikkāmeyya, saṃghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.1.2: sayaṃ yācitvā purisampi purisatthakarampi goṇampi sakaṭampi vāsimpi parasumpi kuṭhārimpi kudālampi nikhādanampi vallimpi veḷumpi muñjampi pabbajampi tiṇampi mattikampi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.1.4: ullittā vā hoti avalittā vā ullittāvalittā vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.1.8: na añño koci sāmiko hoti, itthī vā puriso vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.2: tena kuṭikārakena bhikkhunā kuṭivatthuṃ sodhetvā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.3: “ahaṃ, bhante, saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo assāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.7: Sace sabbo saṃgho ussahati kuṭivatthuṃ oloketuṃ, sabbena saṃghena oloketabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.8: No ce sabbo saṃgho ussahati kuṭivatthuṃ oloketuṃ, ye tattha honti bhikkhū byattā paṭibalā sārambhaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ aparikkamanaṃ jānituṃ te yācitvā sammannitabbā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.12: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo assāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.14: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhū sammanneyya itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kuṭivatthuṃ oloketuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.17: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo assāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.19: Saṃgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhū sammannati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kuṭivatthuṃ oloketuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.20: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa ca itthannāmassa ca bhikkhūnaṃ sammuti itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kuṭivatthuṃ oloketuṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.22: Sammatā saṃghena itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca bhikkhū itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kuṭivatthuṃ oloketuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.25: Tehi sammatehi bhikkhūhi tattha gantvā kuṭivatthu oloketabbaṃ, sārambhaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ aparikkamanaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.26: Sace sārambhaṃ hoti aparikkamanaṃ, “mā idha karī”ti vattabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.27: Sace anārambhaṃ hoti saparikkamanaṃ, saṃghassa ārocetabbaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.29: Tena kuṭikārakena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.30: “ahaṃ, bhante, saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo assāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.36: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo assāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.38: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kuṭivatthuṃ deseyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.41: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo assāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.2.44: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kuṭivatthussa desanā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.3.2: kipillikānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, upacikānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, undūrānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, ahīnaṃ vā āsayo hoti, vicchikānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, satapadīnaṃ vā āsayo hoti, hatthīnaṃ vā āsayo hoti, assānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, sīhānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, byagghānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, dīpīnaṃ vā āsayo hoti, acchānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, taracchānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, yesaṃ kesañci tiracchānagatānaṃ pāṇānaṃ āsayo hoti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.3.3: pubbaṇṇanissitaṃ vā hoti, aparaṇṇanissitaṃ vā hoti, abbhāghātanissitaṃ vā hoti, āghātananissitaṃ vā hoti, susānanissitaṃ vā hoti, uyyānanissitaṃ vā hoti, rājavatthunissitaṃ vā hoti, hatthisālānissitaṃ vā hoti, assasālānissitaṃ vā hoti, bandhanāgāranissitaṃ vā hoti, pānāgāranissitaṃ vā hoti, sūnanissitaṃ vā hoti, racchānissitaṃ vā hoti, caccaranissitaṃ vā hoti, sabhānissitaṃ vā hoti, saṃsaraṇanissitaṃ vā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.3.6: na sakkā hoti yathāyuttena sakaṭena anuparigantuṃ samantā nisseṇiyā anuparigantuṃ. Etaṃ aparikkamanaṃ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.3.8: na kipillikānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, na upacikānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, na undūrānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, na ahīnaṃ vā āsayo hoti, na vicchikānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, na satapadīnaṃ vā āsayo hoti …pe… na saṃsaraṇanissitaṃ vā hoti. Etaṃ anārambhaṃ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.3.10: sakkā hoti yathāyuttena sakaṭena anuparigantuṃ, samantā nisseṇiyā anuparigantuṃ. Etaṃ saparikkamanaṃ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.4.4: ullittā vā hoti avalittā vā ullittāvalittā vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.4.7: Bhikkhū vā anabhineyya, vatthudesanāya pamāṇaṃ vā atikkāmeyyāti
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:2.4.8: ñattidutiyena kammena kuṭivatthuṃ na desāpetvā, āyāmato vā vitthārato vā antamaso kesaggamattampi atikkāmetvā karoti vā kārāpeti vā, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.1.1: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti adesitavatthukaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.1.2: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti adesitavatthukaṃ sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.1.3: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti adesitavatthukaṃ anārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.1.4: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti adesitavatthukaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.1.5: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti desitavatthukaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.1.6: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti desitavatthukaṃ sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.1.7: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti desitavatthukaṃ anārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.1.8: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti desitavatthukaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.2.1: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti pamāṇātikkantaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.2.2: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti pamāṇātikkantaṃ sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.2.3: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti pamāṇātikkantaṃ anārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.2.4: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti pamāṇātikkantaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.2.5: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti pamāṇikaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.2.6: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti pamāṇikaṃ sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.2.8: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti pamāṇikaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, anāpatti.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.3.4: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti adesitavatthukaṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti dvinnaṃ saṃghādisesānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.4.1: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti desitavatthukaṃ pamāṇikaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.9.2: Samādisati ca— “desitavatthukā ca hotu anārambhā ca saparikkamanā cā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.9.3: Tassa kuṭiṃ karonti adesitavatthukaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.9.4: So suṇāti—“kuṭi kira me kayirati adesitavatthukā sārambhā aparikkamanā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.9.5: Tena bhikkhunā sāmaṃ vā gantabbaṃ dūto vā pāhetabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.9.6: “desitavatthukā ca hotu anārambhā ca saparikkamanā cā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.9.7: No ce sāmaṃ vā gaccheyya dūtaṃ vā pahiṇeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.13.15: Tassa kuṭiṃ karonti adesitavatthukaṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti kārukānaṃ catunnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.13.16: sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti kārukānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.13.17: anārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti kārukānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.13.18: anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti kārukānaṃ dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.13.20: Samādisati ca— “desitavatthukā ca hotu pamāṇikā ca anārambhā ca saparikkamanā cā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.13.21: Tassa kuṭiṃ karonti desitavatthukaṃ pamāṇikaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti kārukānaṃ dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.2: Tassa kuṭiṃ karonti adesitavatthukaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.3: So ce vippakate āgacchati, tena bhikkhunā sā kuṭi aññassa vā dātabbā bhinditvā vā puna kātabbā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.4: No ce aññassa vā dadeyya bhinditvā vā puna kāreyya, āpatti saṃghādisesena dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.6: Tassa kuṭiṃ karonti adesitavatthukaṃ sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.7: So ce vippakate āgacchati, tena bhikkhunā sā kuṭi aññassa vā dātabbā bhinditvā vā puna kātabbā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.8: No ce aññassa vā dadeyya bhinditvā vā puna kāreyya, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.13: Tassa kuṭiṃ karonti desitavatthukaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.14: So ce vippakate āgacchati, tena bhikkhunā sā kuṭi aññassa vā dātabbā bhinditvā vā puna kātabbā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.15: No ce aññassa vā dadeyya bhinditvā vā puna kāreyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.20: Tassa kuṭiṃ karonti pamāṇātikkantaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.21: So ce vippakate āgacchati, tena bhikkhunā sā kuṭi aññassa vā dātabbā bhinditvā vā puna kātabbā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.22: No ce aññassa vā dadeyya bhinditvā vā puna kāreyya, āpatti saṃghādisesena dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.27: Tassa kuṭiṃ karonti pamāṇikaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.28: So ce vippakate āgacchati, tena bhikkhunā sā kuṭi aññassa vā dātabbā bhinditvā vā puna kātabbā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.29: No ce aññassa vā dadeyya bhinditvā vā puna kāreyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.34: Tassa kuṭiṃ karonti adesitavatthukaṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.35: So ce vippakate āgacchati, tena bhikkhunā sā kuṭi aññassa vā dātabbā bhinditvā vā puna kātabbā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.36: No ce aññassa vā dadeyya bhinditvā vā puna kāreyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ saṃghādisesena dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.37: sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, āpatti dvinnaṃ saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.38: anārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ, āpatti dvinnaṃ saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.41: Tassa kuṭiṃ karonti desitavatthukaṃ pamāṇikaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.42: So ce vippakate āgacchati, tena bhikkhunā sā kuṭi aññassa vā dātabbā bhinditvā vā puna kātabbā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.43: No ce aññassa vā dadeyya bhinditvā vā puna kāreyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.14.47: Tassa kuṭiṃ karonti desitavatthukaṃ pamāṇikaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.15.1: Attanā vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.15.2: Attanā vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.15.3: Parehi vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss6:3.15.4: Parehi vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
